description: This file defines utility functions for splitting a string into tokens and adding valid tokens to a linked list.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a source string by spaces and returns a linked list of tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (non-empty).
